Exclusive: SK On may start mass producing LFP batteries for automakers in 2026 - executiveSouth Korea's SK On plans to start mass producing lithium iron phosphate (LFP) batteries as early as 2026 to supply several automakers as it pushes to deliver a lower cost battery chemistry favoured by its Chinese rivals, a senior executive said. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 08:04:13 GMT C7LS3ROQLVIANFKEIKDG6BEJXE https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/sk-may-start-mass-having-lfp-batteries-automakers-2026-executive-2024-01-11/Abhirup Roy, Heekyong Yang商业带电
Pakistan's former PM Sharif to launch election campaign as front-runnerPakistan's former prime minister Nawaz Sharif, whose party is considered a front-runner to win general elections in February, will kick off his campaign next week, aides said, days after the Supreme Court cleared him to run for a fourth term. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 08:03:05 GMT 46W4OQS2TZLJDKJWD3RLBBHPUU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/pakistans-former-pm-sharif-launch-election-campaign-front-runner-2024-01-11/Asif Shahzad世界亚太地区
Orienspace launches most powerful rocket by private Chinese firmBeijing startup Orienspace on Thursday successfully launched the most powerful rocket developed by the Chinese private sector, paving the way for more commercial launches - a realm traditionally dominated by the country's state agencies. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 07:43:58 GMT FW6DWI4YNBNMFEQ57A6EWIX74Q https://www.reuters.com/technology/space/orienspace-launches-most-powerful-rocket-by-private-chinese-firm-2024-01-11/Reuters技术空间
Chinese foreign minister Wang Yi to travel to Africa in JanChina's foreign minister Wang Yi will travel to Africa and visit Egypt, Tunisia, Togo and Cote d'Ivoire from Jan. 13-18, China's foreign ministry said on Thursday. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 07:31:42 GMT VX2VZQJOJJIBZPGN22GW4PVHTU https://www.reuters.com/world/chinese-foreign-minister-wang-yi-travel-africa-jan-2024-01-11/Reuters世界
China 2023 vehicle sales rise 12% - industry associationChina's 2023 vehicle sales rose 12% year-on-year to 30.1 million vehicles, the China Association of Automobile Manufacturers (CAAM) said on Thursday. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 06:16:57 GMT 6G7TM6AX6ZMKXJWFYX5ZCNIKRM https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/china-2023-vehicle-sales-rise-12-industry-association-2024-01-11/Reuters商业汽车与交通
National security trial of tycoon Jimmy Lai: what's happened so farHong Kong media tycoon and pro-democracy advocate Jimmy Lai is on trial accused of endangering China's national security.
